changeSet.author: vikas11.sangal
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [ViWeb].[GetVIwebScanParameter] @id int AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; select * from ViWeb.ViWebScan_Parameter where id=@id END
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON ViWeb.GetVIwebScanParameter TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON ViWeb.GetVIwebScanParameter FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE ViWeb.GetVIwebScanParameter;
